Quotes: This action cannot be performed because you have products requiring attention. You must resolve these issues before you can continue.

Quotes: Your quote has expired and the product prices have been updated as per the latest prices in your catalog. You can either re-submit the quote to seller for further negotiation or go to checkout.

Quotes: You are not an owner of this quote. You cannot edit it or take any actions on it.

Quotes: The only special symbols that are allowed in the file name are dash (-) and underscore (_).
Angebote: The only special symbols that are allowed in the file name are dash (-) and underscore (_).

Quotes: %1 is not an allowed file type. Please select a different file.
Angebote: %1 is not an allowed file type. Please select a different file.

Quotes: Coupon codes and gift cards are not allowed on quotes. Choose whether you'd like to keep the coupon code/gift card without requesting a quote, or request a quote without the coupon code/gift card.
Angebote: Gutscheincodes und Geschenkkarten sind nicht für Angebote erlaubt. Wählen Sie, ob Sie den Gutscheincode/Geschenkgutschein behalten möchten, ohne ein Angebot zu verlangen oder ein Angebot ohne Gutscheincode/Geschenkkarte anfordern.

Quotes: You have items in your shopping cart. Would you like to merge items in this order with items of this shopping cart or replace them?

Quotes: Select Cancel to stay on the current page.

Quotes: Are you sure you want to delete this quote?
Angebote: Sind Sie sicher, dass Sie dieses Angebot löschen möchten?

Quotes: Minimum order total for quote request.
This message will be shown in the shopping cart when the subtotal (after discount) is lower than the minimum allowed amount.
Angebote: Diese Meldung wird im Warenkorb angezeigt, wenn die Zwischensumme (nach Rabatt) niedriger ist als der minimal zulässige Betrag.

Quotes: This period will be used as the default expiration time period for quotes. It can be changed for any quote.

Quotes: Separate each file extension with a comma. Special symboles like dots, converted commas, asterisk, etc. are not allowed.

Quotes: File size in MB. Note that this setting can be overridden by the server settings.
Angebote: Dateigröße in MB. Beachten Sie, dass diese Einstellung durch die Servereinstellungen überschrieben werden kann.

Quotes: Email template chosen based on theme fallback when "Default" option is selected.
Angebote: Ausgewählte E-Mail-Vorlage basiert auf dem Fallback-Thema, wenn die Option "Standard" gewählt ist.
